name: Goblin Problem
questDialogue: That goblin problem in the forest is getting worse. Someone should do something about it. I've seen at least 3 of them causing trouble.
killCompleteMessage: You dealt with the goblin threat!
rewardDialogue: You've dealt with those pesky goblins! Here's something for your trouble.

name: Dangerous Wolves
questDialogue: We've had reports of increased wolf activity outside the city. At least 4 dangerous wolves are terrorizing travelers. Someone needs to deal with them.
rewardDialogue: Excellent work! Those wolves were a real threat to our citizens. Take this as thanks.

name: Find the Missing Colleague
questDialogue: Please, brave adventurer! My colleague Elara went into the deep forest to study rare plants weeks ago. She hasn't returned and I fear the worst. Could you venture into the deep forest and find her? I just need to know she's safe!
rewardDialogue: Thank goodness you found me! I completely lost track of time studying these amazing plants. I'm perfectly safe and making wonderful discoveries. Here, take this - it's a rare herb I found that has healing properties!

name: Deliver Good News
questDialogue: Please tell Aldric I'm perfectly safe and making wonderful discoveries. He must be worried sick about me!
rewardDialogue: Oh, what wonderful news! Thank you so much for bringing me word of Elara's safety. I was beside myself with worry. Please, take this reward for your kindness and for reuniting us through your efforts!

name: Bandit Problem
questDialogue: These bandits have been terrorizing my farm! They've stolen crops and threatened my family. Please, brave adventurer, stop them! I've seen at least 3 of them on the forest path. When you're done, report to Captain Thorne at the militia barracks - he needs to know the militia's protection is working.
rewardDialogue: Excellent work, adventurer! Those bandits won't be troubling anyone anymore. The farmer will be relieved to hear this. Here's your reward from the militia fund.

name: Report to the Farmer
questDialogue: The farmer will want to hear the good news personally. Please return to Farmer John at the farm house and let him know his family is safe now.
rewardDialogue: Thank the heavens! You've saved my farm and my family. I can sleep peacefully now knowing those bandits are gone. Please, take this - it's not much, but it's all I can offer.

name: Wolf Pelts Needed
questDialogue: Winter is coming and I need warm pelts to make blankets for the tavern. Bring me 3 wolf pelts and I'll make it worth your while. You can find wolves on the forest path and in the deep forest.
rewardDialogue: Excellent! These pelts are in great condition. Here's your payment - you've earned it!
